pages.title: Brew of Rage
pages.text1: Brew of Rage is a legendary brew, that makes one almost invulnerable and fierce in battle.Beware the forthcoming hangover, it would be cruel.
pages.text3: Effects: heals and protects against Weakness, Slowness, Hunger and Poison, adds Resistance IV, Strenght 6, Absorption III, Slow Falling I.
